entry.title: Vite report on Thu, 24 Aug 2023 20:02:37
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Apple finally thinks you should be able to fix an iPhone or Mac yourself
- Show HN: I built this Postgres logger for you guys to check out
- Scammers are offering fake Waymo jobs on Adobe’s Behance creative social network
- Cypago, which aims to automate compliance and governance for companies, raises $13M
- Google to go further on ads transparency and data access for researchers as EU digital rulebook reboot kicks in
- From Words to Worlds: Exploring Video Narration With AI Multi-Modal Fine-grained Video Description
- Hitachi Energy Teams Up With Google Cloud On Sustainability Initiatives
- Ex-Google team turns AI research into serious Midjourney contender with Ideogram AI

Business:
- A 40% rout in Apple bonds is signaling trouble for bank balance sheets with big debt holdings, markets guru Larry McDonald says
- Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang is now worth about $46 billion – more than Ken Griffin or Stephen Schwarzman
- I shopped around for auto insurance for the first time in 20 years and saved almost $600
- An Arizona man planned to build his retirement home on a plot of land he bought 20 years ago. The problem: It was sold for $200,000 without him knowing.
- Vivek Ramaswamy, an 'anti-woke' biotech millionaire and former Harvard rapper running against Trump, is outperforming expectations in the 2024 GOP race
- Dedollarization suffers a blow as the greenback's share in global payments hits a record high
- 3 Reasons Now May Be The Perfect Time To Launch A Startup

AI:
- From Words to Worlds: Exploring Video Narration With AI Multi-Modal Fine-grained Video Description
- Ex-Google team turns AI research into serious Midjourney contender with Ideogram AI

Other:
- Who is Dmitry Utkin, the Nazi-obsessed Wagner commander presumed dead in the same crash as Prigozhin?
- After nearly 60 years in flight, US Air Force special operators took their AC-130 gunship to Australia for the first time
- Meta earnings: See the social media giant's financial history, dividends, and growth expected from projections
- There is little doubt that Putin had Prigozhin killed — which is almost certainly the point
- The plane carrying Prigozhin seemed fine on radar until a 'sudden downward' drop in its last 30 seconds
- China has banned Japanese seafood over Fukushima's release of wastewater into the ocean
- How I Became a Tech Conference Speaker as a Newbie & How You Can Do It Too
- Hosting Outline, a notion competitor in 15 minutes (on clever cloud)
- This Scientist-Entrepreneur Is Brewing Prescription Drug Ingredients Like They Were Beer
- Nikola’s New CEO Says Hydrogen Semis Still Coming This Year As It Recalls Battery Trucks
- 85% Of Car Drivers Break 20mph Speed Limits, Reveals U.K.’s Department For Transport
- Paper that helped form basis of pricy research tool retracted - Retraction Watch
- Where student-loan forgiveness now stands for millions of borrowers one year after Biden announced his broad debt relief plan

Insights:
- The tech industry is seeing advancements in DIY repairs, AI research, and automation for compliance and governance.
- The business sector is experiencing fluctuations in bond markets, the rise of wealthy CEOs, and unexpected financial savings.
- Other topics include geopolitical events, aviation, social media, and environmental concerns.
- Overall, the report highlights the diverse range of news and developments across various industries and sectors.
